com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy

Class PolicyDefaults

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.PolicyDefaults
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DOMPolicyDefaults

    public class PolicyDefaults
extends java.lang.Object
    PolicyDefaults represents the default values associated with a XACML 3.0 Policy or PolicySet that may be overridden or inherited by child Policies or PolicySets.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PolicyDefaults(java.net.URI xpathVersionIn, PolicyDefaults policyDefaultsParentIn)
      Creates a new PolicyDefaults with the given URI for the XPath version and the given PolicyDefaults pointing to the parent.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PolicyDefaults

        public PolicyDefaults(java.net.URI xpathVersionIn,
              PolicyDefaults policyDefaultsParentIn)
        Creates a new PolicyDefaults with the given URI for the XPath version and the given PolicyDefaults pointing to the parent.
        Parameters:
        xpathVersionIn - the URI representing the XPath version for the new PolicyDefaults
        policyDefaultsParentIn - the PolicyDefaults object that is the parent of the new PolicyDefaults

    • Method Detail

      • getPolicyDefaultsParent

        public PolicyDefaults getPolicyDefaultsParent()
        Gets the parent PolicyDefaults for this PolicyDefaults.
        Returns:
        the parent PolicyDefaults for this PolicyDefaults or null if none

      • getXPathVersion

        public java.net.URI getXPathVersion()
        Gets the XPath version URI for this PolicyDefaults. If there is no explicit version in this PolicyDefaults, walk up the parent PolicyDefaults hierarchy until one is found, or return the default value.
        Returns:
        the URI for the XPath version

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
